summary: In order to evade the law, a ruthless don tries to kill his lookalike; a chef and tries to take his place.
cast: Shah Rukh Khan|Juhi Chawla|Sonali Bendre|Kajol|Mohnish Bahl|Farida Jalal|Tiku Talsania|Sharat Saxena|Rana Jung Bahadur|Gulshan Grover|Naresh Suri|Parminder|Randhawa|Robert|Chunnu Mehra|Praveer|K. Vijaykar|Irfan Merchant|Meghna Pandya|Vishwajeet Pradhan
title: Duplicate
